name: PRB_TEMP_INFO
description: This table displays information about the problems, goals, and outcomes associated with the template problem record.

columns.name: TEMPLATE_PROBLEM_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the problem record.

columns.name: TEMPLATE_PROBLEM_ID_TEMPLATE_PROB_NAME
columns.description: This column displays the template problem name.

columns.name: TEMPLATE_PROB_NAME
columns.description: This column displays the template problem name.
